name: debt-xecutive
description:
submission to the brackey's game jam 20201.2

you work for a company which has gone a bit under. as an auditor you must go through all the employees (and the manager) to create money for the company. but watch out! unhappy and unproductive employees can halt your progress. manage your money, employee happiness, and productivity to restructure out of debt

CONTROLS:

  • hold rmb (or mmb) and drag to move the camera
  • left click requests to fulfill them
  • scroll up and down to zoom in and out

TOOLS USED:

  • blender
  • krita
  • unity

didn't get too much time to work on this over the week but i had a lot of fun working on this short little game
